docs.title: Adding Information to the Page
docs.text:
Use Markdown to add information to the pages of your site.

For example, here is a list:

  1. Item 1
  2. Item 2
  3. Item 3

Here is another list:

  • Another item
  • Another item

docs.title: Adding a New Page
docs.text:
Add new pages to your site doing the following:

  1. Create a .md file to the docs folder.
  2. Open the mkdocs.yml file.
  3. Add the title of the page and the name of the .md file you created under nav:.

To learn more about MkDocs, see the User Guide for more complete documentation of all of MkDocs' features.

docs.title: How to Make a Ham and Cheese Sandwich
docs.text: This guide provides step-by-step instructions to make a ham and cheese sandwich.

docs.title: Ingredients
docs.text:
Gather the following ingredients:

  • Two slices of bread
  • Two slices of ham
  • One or two slices of cheese
  • Two leaves of lettuce
  • Three slices of tomato
  • Two rings of onion
  • Mayonnaise

docs.title: Steps to Make the Sandwich
docs.text:
To make the sandwich:

  1. Wash your hands.
  2. Place one slice of bread on the plate.
  3. Spread mayonnaise evenly on the bread.
  4. Place one leaf of lettuce on top of the bread.
  5. Arrange the slices of tomato on top of the lettuce.
  6. Place one slice of ham on top of the tomato slices.
  7. Add the cheese slices on top of the ham.
  8. Place the second slice of ham on top of the cheese.
  9. Add the onion rings on top of the ham.
  10. Place the second leaf of lettuce on top of the onion rings.
  11. Top with the second slice of bread.
